This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0 by commit 921ebde3c0d22c8cba74ce8eb3cc4626abff1ccd, it was introduced in version v6.0 by commit 43eb8949cfdffa764b92bc6c54b87cbe5b0003fe. For more details please see the references link.
